Custom Maps.author: Keku645
Custom Maps.Description: Set in a parallel universe where Faith from 2008 is in the MEC universe. Faith hacks a computer to get information and must get back to the lair. Features rain, MEC AI models and more!

Custom Maps.author: [RBS] Dominicus
Custom Maps.Description: Immerse yourself in the retrowave atmosphere in one of the best parkour games.

Custom Maps.author: [RBS] Dominicus
Custom Maps.Description: Faith must deliver a package to Celeste while running through dangers.

Custom Maps.author: Keko
Custom Maps.Description: In the authority zone, you've made the decision to retrieve the secret bag that's crucial to all of the runners. Unfortunately a so-called "Special Unit" has interrupted the mission before Faith.

Custom Maps.author: Keku645
Custom Maps.Description: Faith in the backrooms.

Custom Maps.author: Keku645
Custom Maps.Description: My submission for the level design jam by Steeve Lee. Level is finished and can be playable from start to finish, unfortunately I didnt have enough time to finish the background and a few more gameplay sections. The map is highly inspired from MEC with assets used from it too.

Custom Maps.author: Koce92
Custom Maps.Description: Prison level inspired by the concept art.

Custom Maps.author: FNG_Creepa
Custom Maps.Description: You're trapped in a glitch world and you need to escape back to the city before YOU get glitched.

Custom Maps.author: Lipticon
Custom Maps.Description: Join Faith on an adventure through Down Town to drop off a package.

Custom Maps.author: Cratornugget
Custom Maps.Description: There's no story really, just running.

Custom Maps.author: NoahFreedom
Custom Maps.Description: Faith has to pickup a bag that was left behind by another runner due to the patrol route the CPF take there everyday.

Custom Maps.author: Arkathtoo
Custom Maps.Description: A custom map by Arkathtoo.

Custom Maps.author: Keku645
Custom Maps.Description: Leap of Faith 2.0 introduces a complete lighting overhaul with minor bug fixes and new custom content such as custom music tracks made by Nakuhito.

Custom Maps.author: Keku645
Custom Maps.Description: Faith has to deliver a bag to Celeste in a sunrise city while most of the town is still sleeping.

Custom Maps.author: V Wings
Custom Maps.Description: Traverse the mysterious city and locate the hidden collectibles to progress.

Custom Maps.author: Theironlefty
Custom Maps.Description: Typical day for Faith, delivery of the bag pre-Prologue.

Custom Maps.author: Coronaooo
Custom Maps.Description: Coronavirus invaded the city of Glass, help Faith to wash her hands.

Custom Maps.author: TCtully
Custom Maps.Description: The client has left their package for pickup in their office, near Westside Commons. Merc puts Faith on the job, once she picks up the package she is to deliver it a few blocks East, but things never go according to plan.

Custom Maps.author: Glost999
Custom Maps.Description: A custom map by Glost999.

Custom Maps.author: steveglowplunk
Custom Maps.Description: After the events in the main game, Faith hid for months until an anonymous tracker offers her a job to retrieve a runner bag. Running out of money, Faith decides to take on the run despite being wanted by the CPF.

Custom Maps.FriendlyName: Celeste and Faith escape aka Edge_Pee
Custom Maps.author: VeryFatFaith
Custom Maps.Description: Best map ever. Contains everything you may have wanted from a Mirror's Edge map. Make sure you give triforce Kate a kick.

Custom Maps.author: Foxy4
Custom Maps.Description: Explore the open world, collect information, help people, find secrets and have fun!

Custom Maps.author: Keku645
Custom Maps.Description: The events that follow immediately after the Flight chapter (strays from the established lore).

Custom Maps.author: Artemy
Custom Maps.Description: The freeroam version of Artemy's Residential map.

Custom Maps.author: steveglowplunk
Custom Maps.Description: steveglowplunk's attempt at recreating the Mirror's Edge prototype.

Custom Maps.author: Koce92
Custom Maps.Description: At least 30 minutes of gameplay filled with puzzles, parkour and action. This map also has 7 hidden bags to find.

Custom Maps.author: Mishkin
Custom Maps.Description: Step into Faith's shoes before the events of Mirror's Edge, and parkour your way through roofs, parking garages, and office buildings as you try to infiltrate a facility that you believe acts as a front against other runners.

Custom Maps.author: Keku645
Custom Maps.Description: Rendering World 2.0 is a reimagined and extended version of the previous one.

Custom Maps.author: Keku645
Custom Maps.Description: This map contains over 30 minutes of gameplay, 15 hidden bags, a lot of places to explore, and a lot of routes to take.

Custom Maps.author: Keku645
Custom Maps.Description: Faith returned to The Shard to pick up a bag, but she gets detected and has to escape from there.

Custom Maps.author: Keku645
Custom Maps.Description: Faith has stolen a bag and she has to give it to Kreeg.

Custom Maps.author: Artemy
Custom Maps.Description: This is my first map for Mirror's Edge.

Custom Maps.author: Artemy
Custom Maps.Description: This was a test map where I learned how to import textures into the editor and how to set up bots. Since this map was very time-consuming, and there wouldn't be much interest in it, I decided not to continue it.

Custom Maps.author: Stas
Custom Maps.Description: Test chambers based on the video game Portal.

Custom Maps.author: Stas
Custom Maps.Description: Based on the 2012 mobile game 'SpeedX'.

Custom Maps.author: Stas
Custom Maps.Description: Faith awakens in the Portal 2 test chambers and must escape before the reactor reaches critical temperatures.

Custom Maps.author: Stas
Custom Maps.Description: Faith has to carry out a new assignment while on night shift. Merc has received some strange signals from Celeste's mobile phone on one of the rooftops. He wants Faith to investigate this signal. Faith decides to carry this Assignment out at night to avoid being spotted by Blues, but little does she know that Celeste may be planning something rather... unexpected.

Custom Maps.author: MSIP35
Custom Maps.Description: A beautiful, bustling city made in the same style as the stock Mirror's Edge City. This map is huge. NOT free roam. Be prepared to dodge cops and rampage through large interiors including warehouses, offices and building sites.

Custom Maps.author: Chimeray
Custom Maps.Description: The level starts off after a long day of work, but it's not over yet because Faith gets a call to do some overtime. You must retrieve a bag inside a building that Celeste hid because she dropped out, so you need to finish her assignment instead.

Custom Maps.author: Stas
Custom Maps.Description: A custom map by Stas.

Custom Maps.author: Stas
Custom Maps.Description: A custom map by Stas.

Custom Maps.author: Stas
Custom Maps.Description: A custom map by Stas.

Custom Maps.author: Stas
Custom Maps.Description: A custom map by Stas.

Custom Maps.author: edgie
Custom Maps.Description: The freeroam version of edgie's Stark Concrete map.

Custom Maps.author: MSIP35
Custom Maps.Description: A custom map by MSIP35.

Custom Maps.author: Blueberry_pie
Custom Maps.Description: The map takes place on a small part of a freeway where people drive too fast and too close to each other. There's no goal and not much parkour involved either. You can just run around dodging traffic or go surfing on cars, which can be fun for a while. However, the cars don't damage you, and jumping from one car to another isn't possible, unfortunately.

Custom Time Trials.packdescription: Mirror's Edge gameplay distilled down to its purest form and its purest vision in nine races across eight all-new and totally redesigned Time Trial maps. No cops, no guns, no city. Pure aesthetics, agility and flow that will challenge any Runner. Note: Includes PS3-exclusive Synesthesia map and Keku's Actino Ultra map.
Custom Time Trials.author: DICE

Custom Time Trials.packdescription: Original maps with custom time trial checkpoint placements. Includes: Arena, Arena 1, Arena 2, Arland 2, Beverage Lift, Boat 1, Boat 2, Burfield 2, Canals 1, Chase 2, Convoy 3, Convoy 4, Cranes 3, Edge 2, Elevator Lobby, Heat 2, Loading Bay, Mall 1, Office, Office 2, Pirandello Kruger, Prologue 1, Stormdrains 4, and Subway 1.
Custom Time Trials.author: Keku645 & nulaft
Keku645
Custom Time Trials.Description: Sianvar is one of the biggest custom time trial maps ever made, explore the vast and unexplored dream world of Faith and get yourself lost.

Custom Time Trials.author: Odjur
Custom Time Trials.Description: An extremely difficult glitchless execution test for speedrunners. This map is not intended for casual players. If you are a speedrunner and want to test your knowledge of speed tech, this is the place to do it. That being said, every section of this time trial can be completed glitchless, as all maps should be.

Custom Time Trials.packdescription: Luna is a collection of three custom Coastal Forest time trials.
Custom Time Trials.author: ToastyGoblin

packedmaps.Description: Luna is a custom Coastal Forest time trial for Mirror's Edge.
Luna is a custom Coastal Forest time trial for Mirror's Edge.
Luna is a custom Coastal Forest time trial for Mirror's Edge.

Custom Time Trials.author: steveglowplunk
Custom Time Trials.Description: A custom time trial by steveglowplunk.

Custom Time Trials.packdescription: Twilight is a collection of three custom nighttime city time trials.
Custom Time Trials.author: ToastyGoblin

packedmaps.Description: Twilight is a custom nighttime city time trial.
Twilight is a custom nighttime city time trial.
Twilight is a custom nighttime city time trial.

Custom Time Trials.author: steveglowplunk
Custom Time Trials.Description: Vertex is a custom time trial with a slightly retro style.

Custom Time Trials.author: ToastyGoblin
Custom Time Trials.Description: Void is a custom abstract time trial.

Custom Time Trials.author: ToastyGoblin
Custom Time Trials.Description: Anti Gravity is a custom abstract time trial.

Custom Time Trials.author: ToastyGoblin
Custom Time Trials.Description: Sol is a custom abstract time trial.

Custom Time Trials.packdescription: The time trial version of Artemy's Residential map, featuring three trials.
Custom Time Trials.author: Artemy
ToastyGoblin
Custom Time Trials.Description: This mod is a standalone time trial for Mirror's Edge that is very similiar to one of my older maps I released in 2015.

Story Experiences.author: Keku645
Story Experiences.Description: Rainy Mod is a WIP project with the aim to make the whole game with a rainy weather mood. It contains Real Time Reflections, Parallax Cube Maps, dynamic wet/dry clothing, new rain particles, new sounds and more. The following mod contains Training Zone and Prologue, either can be played in story mode or as time trials.

Story Experiences.author: Keku645
Story Experiences.Description: Remember when you used to play floor is lava when you were a kid? Now you can also do it in Mirror's Edge! Push the in-game mechanics as far as you can, and remember, no hitting the floor if you don't want to die. P.S. Not for casual players, difficulty level is over 9000.
